repairedDockerfile:
FROM python:2.7-alpine 
MAINTAINER Sami Haahtinen <ressu@ressukka.net> 

# Download gosu and SickGear. 
RUN apk add --update \  
ca-certificates \  
curl \  
gcc \  
gnupg \  
libxml2 \  
libxml2-dev \  
libxslt \  
libxslt-dev \  
musl-dev \  
tzdata \  
su-exec \  
&& \  
mkdir /opt && \
 TAG_NAME=$( curl -f -s https://api.github.com/repos/SickGear/SickGear/releases | \
python -c "import sys, json; print json.load(sys.stdin)[0]['tag_name']") && \
 curl -f -SL "https://github.com/SickGear/SickGear/archive/${TAG_NAME}.tar.gz" | \
tar xz -C /opt && \
mv /opt/SickGear-${TAG_NAME} /opt/SickGear && \
pip install --no-cache-dir lxml && \
pip install --no-cache-dir -r /opt/SickGear/requirements.txt && \
apk del \  
curl \  
gcc \  
gnupg \  
libxml2-dev \  
libxslt-dev \  
musl-dev \
&& \
rm -rf /var/cache/apk/*

ENV APP_DATA="/data" PATH=/opt/SickGear:$PATH 

EXPOSE 8081 
VOLUME /data /tv /incoming 

COPY template /template 
COPY entrypoint.sh / 

ENTRYPOINT ["/entrypoint.sh"] 

CMD ["SickBeard.py"]
